James Redford, Documentarian and Environmentalist, Dies at 58
results.abstract: After two liver transplants, he founded an institute to increase awareness. He and his father, Robert Redford, also championed environmental films.

results.title: ‘We Cannot Kill That Little Chihuahua’: Actor’s Puppy Crusade Shines Light on Global Trade
results.abstract: The action star Jean-Claude Van Damme intervened to save a Bulgarian dog from euthanasia after Norway said it had been imported on a fake passport.

multimedia.caption: The actor Jean-Claude Van Damme made a Facebook video about the plight of Raya, a 3-month-old Chihuahua who faced euthanasia in Norway after apparently being trafficked from Bulgaria.
